ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Umm... easy on the mana...
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings! Desparate Dirge - well I loaded it thinking I might as well since I had an open slot (and maybe get the kill shot).  Heh, read thru the log and you
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings!

Desparate Dirge - well I loaded it thinking I might as well since I had an
open slot (and maybe get the kill shot). Heh, read thru the log and you
cans see I should have used Bellow or just whacked him with my 6 Note more.
Guess I should have had Chains memmed too? Good thing we had a ranger with
us <g>. Also funny to see Inny apparently target one of us then AE nuke and
take damage from his own spell - heh.

Sunderfury, Beckon and the Wizard's Diamond wand? Later the Maestro dropped
the Erudite Paladin shield.

Uncle Inny goes out for his nightly stroll thru the streets of Hateville...
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/hate/innie.jpg
I think you can see that we have been despelled and bard songs re-filled the
first two slots. Purifyuing & Guardian with MM battle drum on keys 1 and 2.
3 and 4 had Hymn and Niv's and you can see my 7 String ready to be swapped
over.

He gets to low health and trys to run...
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/hate/innie_runs.jpg
I blast him with Dirge and you can see the results - heh. My songs: Dirge,
Purifying, Guardian, Hymn, CoCess, Niv's, Bind Sight, and Clarity. Our
cleric had just gotten healed - it looks like i had switched to hymn/niv's
with the lute right before the dirge.

Here is a shot where I scrolled back to get the kill message recorded.
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/hate/odyb_ks_innie.jpg
The guy in the pic is a cleric - wonder if he is offereing Inny a rez for
100pp? Arif is a shaman, Bunion a clr, Kuppy a rogue and Nadare enchanter.
No, that is not a tishan orb (I wish) but Shimmering Orb AC 15.

Enjoy,

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Bardette of 48 songs (Saturday - ice giants for 2 bubs; Sun more ice giants
then Runnyeye CR for 3 hours - not mine this time.)
... somewhere on Innoruuk
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, March 26, 2000 8:54 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Umm... easy on the mana...


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
>
> only once since i got this song has it actually helped. we still all
died,
> but it allowed us to get the yak from the lord before we were all gone.
it

> Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard

> > However, IMO, it was still a waste of
> > time because
> > as others have pointed out, the song is way underpowered for
> > the hassle
> > it involves. They may as well have made the song make the
> > bard blow up,
> > killing everything around him, for all the good it usually does.
